name: Roulette (itch)
description:
Create bets by "Left-Clicking" on the appropriate bet location.

Choose your bet increment by clicking on the chips at the bottom, or select a custom increment amount by: clicking on the red chip, typing in the chip amount, and hitting the "Enter" key.

You start with 500 chips, however, if you lose all of your chips, then the game will only give you 100 chips.

Features:

           -Select different chip colors by "Left-Clicking" on the colored chips above the                    roulette wheel.

           -Remove all current bets by clicking on the "Total Chip" located near the right-                  bottom corner of the Roulette Table.

            -Toggle on/off decrease bet mode by pressing "Right-Click"; after enabling                           decrease bet mode,  "Left-Click" on your bets to subtract from your bet.

            -The game will save your total chips after every spin; even after you close the                    browser or restart your machine, the game will load the amount of chips that                    you last saved.

Disclaimer: I do not own any of the sprites/images used in this game; I simply found, edited, and implemented images spread throughout the web.

Enjoy!
